user.title: Set up EPA (Victoria) Air Monitoring
user.description:
You need to sign up for an EPA Developer account as described in the readme and obtain an API Key.

Latitude and longitude will be used to find the nearest EPA air quality monitoring station to obtain air quality data for your location. The default values come from your homeassistant "Home" zone (See Settings/Areas & Zones/Zones).

Site ID will be determined based on Latitude and Longitude, or can be supplied if you know the Site ID you want to monitor.

location.title: Set up EPA (Victoria) Air Monitoring
location.description: Nearest Site ID is determined based on Home Assistant Latitude and Longitude, or can be supplied if you know the Site ID you want to monitor.

init.title: Configure EPA (Victoria) Air Monitoring
init.description: Change the API Key if required, latitude and longitude used to find the nearest weather station, or Site ID.
